page.title: 20DAY IN THE LIFE OF: COMMUTER
page.content: Leaving home at{7.45am,}I walk hurredly to{Shenfield Station}to catch the{8.15}train to{Liverpool St.}My annual{season ticket}costs{Â£800 } The train is very crowded and I stand for the whole journey. Everyone is in a hurry - briefcases and umbrellas clash in the confusion. On{arrival}at {8.52}I walk to the office where, at last, I can relax. After as hectic day I return home on the{5.34}train. I am usually able to get a seat and read the "Evening Standard." Only one more day until the weekend!
